Description: Lamp; green glazed pottery; part of spout missing.
Curator's comments: Cf. R. Mason & J. Tugwell, 'Fatimid Tall-Necked Lamps and Their Associates: A Typology', Journal of the American Research Center in Egypt 47 (2011) 335-53, esp. 341-4.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
